title: Stellantis - Wikipedia
snippet: Stellantis N.V. is a multinational automotive manufacturing corporation formed in 2021 through the merger of the French PSA Group and Fiat Chrysler Automobiles (FCA), which was itself created by the merger of Italy's Fiat and the US-based Chrysler, completed in stages between 2009 and 2014.

title: Official Global Website | Stellantis
snippet: Welcome to the Official Global Website of Stellantis, a leading global automaker and provider of innovative mobility solutions.

title: Stellantis (STLA): Company Profile, Stock Price, News, Rankings | Fortune
snippet: It operates 14 iconic brands including Jeep, Peugeot, Fiat, and Chrysler with a worldwide presence. Headquartered in the Netherlands, the company focuses on electrification, innovation and sustainable mobility.
